function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negligible correlation between the number of confirmed new cases with minimum and maximum temperature","Impact":"Inability to use climatic parameters to understand the transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Focus on other factors such as person-to-person transmission, social distancing, and treatment","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Residents of London, Birmingham, Leeds, Manchester, Sheffield","Owner":"Health authorities and local government"},{"Description":"Threat of a second wave of COVID-19 and future pandemics","Impact":"Risk of widespread transmission and impact on public health and infrastructure","Mitigation":"Implementation of clear urban policies, preparation for future pandemics, and investment in public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Urban planning and public health infrastructure","People":"Residents of big cities","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"}]}
